item.description:
Join Reggie B. Productions, the Hello Stiletto Shoe Club, and Project Smile for "Santa and Stilettos" Saturday, December 11th from 7-11pm at the Hyatt Regency Boston.

This will be an evening to celebrate gorgeous footwear, fabulous fashion and the spirit of the holidays. Complete with dancing and live music, the evening's highlight is a runway fashion show of festive footwear and fashion from a number of local and national designers and sponsors including Lord & Taylor. Event will also feature complimentary appetizers and live music performances.

Ladies: be sure to wear your most fabulous shoes, as local fashionistas will be judging the naughty and the nice, awarding prizes to the most well-heeled guests.

Guys: Don't miss out- this is a fun event to be enjoyed by all!

Tickets are $20 in advance and $25 at the door. A portion of each ticket, as well as a silent auction will benefit Project Smile (founded by your Meet Up organizer, Catherine), a local nonprofit organization dedicated to helping children involved in traumatic situations.

Advanced tickets are recommended and can be purchased at: www.reggiebproductions.com
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside event ballroom- near ticket entrance. Please call 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding us.
item.name: Santa and Stilettos, a Holiday Party to Benefit Project Smile
